# Amplify Ley Field (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Personal

**Area:** 30-ft.-radius emanation

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 116

You create a shimmering field of charged ley energy within a 30-ft. radius. This energy enhances the natural power of [[Ley Lines and Shadow Roads|ley lines]] within its area, increasing their power from non-existent to weak, weak to strong, or strong to titanic for the spellâ€™s duration.
